meanings.definition: To roopit is to make a loud, harsh noise.
meanings.sent1: The lion began to roopit loudly in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the birds roopit in the early morning.
meanings.sent3: The car decided to roopit just as I was about to fall asleep.
meanings.sent4: The wind started to roopit through the trees, creating a haunting melody.
meanings.sent5: The machine continued to roopit, causing a disturbance in the peaceful forest.
